content: klappschal is a german word meaning folding scarf it is a traditional shape that is made from a simple rectangle that is then folded and seamed requiring only 85 yds of each color of dk weight yarn this is a great project for remnant yarn a warm fast and stylish accessory for your winter wardrobe size 7x23 5 before seaming materials 1 50g skein of dk yarn minimum 85yds color a as pictured malabrigo silky merino camel 1 50g skein of dk yarn minimum 85yds color b as pictured malabrigo silky merino teal feather j 6 00mm tunisian crochet hook tapestry needle to seam and weave in ends gauge 16 stitches and 15 row worked in tunisian simple stitch equals 4 by 4 stitches & notes us crochet terminology chain = chain tss = tunisian simple stitch yo = yarn over ls = last stitch work last stitch on row by inserting the hook between the forward and back bars with the yo from the start of the prior return pass in front of the hook yo draw up loop doing this special last stitch provides a more finished look to the edge tss cast-off = tunisian simple stitch cast-off work a tss but pull through loop on hook as well only one loop will be on the hook for the forward pass there is no return pass on a cast-off row 1 one tunisian crochet row consists of a forward pass and a return pass work return passes as a basic return pass brp yo draw through 1 loop *yo draw through 2 loops** repeat from * to ** to end of row the last stitch on the return pass forms the first stitch of the next forward pass this is why the first stitch on each row is skipped pattern in color a ch27 foundation row continuing with color a insert hook in back loop of the second chain from hook yo and draw through loop retaining loop on hook draw up a loop in the next chain and every chain to the end of the row 27 stitches join color b and use for the brp row 1 with color b skip first vertical bar tss ls pick up color a and use for the brp row 2 with color from last brp skip first vertical bar tss ls pick up other color and use for the brp repeat row 2 until the work measures 23 5 inches row 3 with color from last brp skip first vertical bar tss cast-off till last stitch remains unworked ls cast-off fasten-off weave in ends and block to dimensions 7 x 23 5 inches assembly with wrong side stripes facing fold rectangle as shown seam together side edges as shown using mattress stitch warning if the seam is too tight it may be difficult to get the scarf over your head i recommend not finishing off the seam until you try on the scarf so you can loosen the seaming
